channel.title: Software on It's All Downhill From Here
channel.description: Recent content in Software on It's All Downhill From Here

item.title: Timeless Rules of Software Development
item.description:
Rules

  • Fail Fast
  • Be Paranoid
  • Avoid inserting defects
  • Find/Fix Defects Close to where they are inserted
  • Accept and deal with the 4Fs of war - friction, fog, fluidity, fatigue
